about_the_game:
"Herbals tycoon" is a masterpiece of a game that blends ancient style charm with deep business strategy, transporting players into a mysterious and fantastical world of traditional Chinese medicine. Here, you are not only a healer but also an explorer, a manager, and a transmitter of knowledge, writing your own herbal legend with every moment.



Product Features:

Immersive Ancient Style Experience:
The game uses exquisite ancient-style graphics and melodious traditional music to create a rich cultural atmosphere, making players feel as though they have traveled back in time to personally experience the profoundness of traditional Chinese medicine culture.


Rich Herbal Knowledge:
The game includes a large number of real medicinal herbs and their effects. As players explore and manage their resources, they not only learn rich knowledge of traditional Chinese medicine but also feel the legendary stories behind each herb.


Deep Business Strategy:
From the construction and management of the clinic, to the planting and processing of herbs, to the diagnosis and treatment of patients, every step requires careful planning and execution. Through reasonable resource allocation and business strategy, make your clinic a renowned sanctuary of healing.


Varied Gameplay Modes:
The game offers not only a main storyline mode that allows players to gradually uncover the secrets of the herbal world, but also various gameplay modes such as market trading, staff recruitment, and adventure exploration, making the game experience more diverse and colorful.


Interactive Companion System:
Players can recruit unique companions to join their clinic. These companions not only have unique skills and backstories but can also interact with the player, completing tasks and challenges together. By giving gifts and raising salaries, you can increase their favorability, unlocking more hidden plots and special events.
